page.title: 03A DAY IN THE LIFE OF NATALIE
page.content: On a typical Wednesday,I bathe,dress and go downstairs for a breakfast of cornflakes.My Mother gives a friend a lift to school.At 8.40am we leave by car and arrive 5 minutes later.The teacher calls the register at 9.00am.Assembly follows.The Headmistress tells us about a true fact to do with that day.We sing and pray. First lesson is Physical Education and secondly,French,until break at 10.30am. We can buy crisps,biscuits or drinks. After break,the lessons are Drama and Religious Education.Lunch follows.For lunch we can bring sandwiches,have school dinners,or go home.Lunch-break lasts for 75 minutes.Following lunch are Maths and English.School finishes at 3.30pm.We go home by car.I do my homework and play until dinner. Afterwards I go to judo.I return and read until 9.30pm when I go to bed.
